function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interaction effects between childcare, pupils, and nursing on infection incidence","Impact":"Potentially reverses negative marginal effects and influences infection incidence based on region's age","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive analysis of moderator effects in future research to understand the influence of different factors on infection incidence","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling and data analysis techniques","People":"Population groups above the average age, regions with high average age","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unconfirmed effects of nursing on infection incidence in older regions","Impact":"Unclear impact of nursing on infection incidence in regions with high average age","Mitigation":"Further research and analysis to understand the influence of nursing on infection incidence in older regions","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling and data analysis techniques","People":"Population in regions with high average age","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
